description: [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) created a RAR archive of targeted files for exfiltration.(Citation: FireEye APT41 Aug 2019) Additionally, [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) used the makecab.exe utility to both download tools, such as NATBypass, to the victim network and to archive a file for exfiltration.(Citation: apt41_dcsocytec_dec2022)
